prompt:
Patient: Why? No.

Nurse: Thank you for your response, Mr. Delarosa. Now, do you report any numbness on your arms or legs?

Patient: What does that have to do with anything?

Nurse: I understand your concern, Mr. Delarosa. These questions are part of a standard procedure to ensure your well-being. Have you noticed any numbness on your arms or legs recently?

Patient: No. I haven't.

Nurse: Give me a moment while I figure out how I can best help you.

Nurse: I apologize for the confusion earlier, Mr. Delarosa. I thought you said you had one-sided leg weakness. Could you please confirm whether this is correct?

Patient: This is incorrect.

responses.gpt4: I apologize for the confusion, Mr. Delarosa. I thought earlier you mentioned experiencing one-sided arm weakness. Can you kindly confirm if this is accurate?
responses.our_model: I apologize for the confusion, Mr. Delarosa. I thought you said you had one-sided arm weakness. Could you please confirm whether this is correct?
